item.title: John Oliver Mocks Trump’s Stroll Atop White House Roof: “The President Just Fully Snoopied on National TV”
item.description: “That may actually be a perfect encapsulation of Trump’s presidency: A bunch of people yelling, ‘What the f*** are you doing?’” the ‘Last Week Tonight’ host quipped after the president caught reporter

item.title: John Oliver Talks Legal Battles, Late Night Turmoil and Clapping Back at His Owners
item.description: The ‘Last Week Tonight’ host also sounds off on Stephen Colbert’s “horrible, horrible” news and the future of the format.

item.title: John Oliver Talks Legal Battles, Late Night Turmoil and Clapping Back at His Owners

item.title: John Oliver Says ‘Late Show’ Cancellation Is “Incredibly Sad”
item.description: “It’s terrible, terrible news for the world of comedy,” the ‘Last Week Tonight’ host added.
